articles.author: Joel Rabinowitz
articles.title: Alberto Moreno's Manchester United humbling uncovers a wider Jürgen Klopp reality for Liverpool - Liverpool.com
articles.description: The Spaniard endeared himself to Liverpool supporters after winning the third major European trophy of his career last night.
articles.content: Even the mere mention of the name Alberto Moreno is enough to bring back painful, vivid memories of the 2016 Europa League final in Basel, in which he was at the centre of Liverpools spectacular seco… [+4228 chars]
